feature.name: Network-Assisted CRS Interference Cancellation
feature.summary: The Network-Assisted CRS Interference Cancellation feature increases throughput by

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.physicalLayerCellIdGroup
parameters.description: The Network-Assisted CRS Interference Cancellation FDD feature uses this                 information to get the physical cell ID of internal eNodeB neighbor cells.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.physicalLayerSubCellId
parameters.description: The Network-Assisted CRS Interference Cancellation FDD feature uses this                 information to get the physical cell ID of internal eNodeB neighbor cells.

parameters.name: SectorCarrier.noOfTxAntennas
parameters.description: The UE uses this information to perform CRS interference cancellation.

parameters.name: MbsfnArea.commonSFAllocList
parameters.description: The UE uses this information to perform CRS interference cancellation.

parameters.name: ExternalEUtranCellFDD.physicalLayerCellIdGroup
parameters.description: The Network-Assisted CRS Interference Cancellation FDD feature uses this                 information to get the physical cell ID of external eNodeB neighbor cells.

parameters.name: ExternalEUtranCellFDD.physicalLayerSubCellId
parameters.description: The Network-Assisted CRS Interference Cancellation FDD feature uses this                 information to get the physical cell ID of external eNodeB neighbor cells.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012002 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012002 MO instance.
